item.description:
Hi Packers,

I am delighted to announce our next “meetup” after a week off, this weeks game is at 4.15pm against the San Diego, being the only undefeated team in football will make it interesting against the Chargers especially as they are coming off a short week with a loss against Kansas City on Monday. We will be meeting on the 2nd floor of the Banshee as usual, if you feel like getting in early to watch some 1pm games we will be here for you. I hope you all had a great week off see you at the Banshee on Sunday afternoon, GO PACK.

(as usual any feedback welcome)

Follow us on twitter; @bansheeboston @packersboston

Ray Butler

group.name: The Boston Green Bay Packers Meetup Group

item.name: Green Bay at San Diego
